description:
Works with skinny road tires or your winter fat bike. Just adjust a few screws to get the right fit for your 2-wheeled freedom machine of choice, and roll the bike into place. Freestanding, so zero holes in walls required.

  • Adjusts to securely hold any wheel size
  • Wide base with triangulated arms holds bike firmly
  • Easy in and out
  • Rubberized feet protects floors and holds it in place
  • Dimensions are 56 x 38 x 43cm
name: Delta Shop Rack Bike Stand
